p: The structure of limonen-10-ol methyl ether was deduced by comparing the fragmentation pattern to that of limonen-10-ol and observing the following differences: the molecular ion ( m/z 166) lost a methyl radical ( m/z 15) to give the cation ion ( m/z 151) corresponding to limonen-10-ol one. Moreover, the shift of arithmetic index of a couple of compounds, thymol and thymol methyl ether (AI: 1289 and 1232, respectively) [ 15], was comparable to that of limonen-10-ol and limonen-10-ol methyl ether (exp.AI: 1291 and 1235, respectively; AI: 1288 for limonen-10-ol from literature [ 15].
